body.name: Yoobure Night Stand with Charging Station, 16 Colors LED Nightstand with USB Ports and Outlets, End Table with 3 Fabric Drawers and Storage Shelf, Bedside Tables Small Dresser for Small Space White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 16 hrs 32 mins
features: 🔥Always by Your Side, Design for Your Better Life!

🌈【LED Nightstands】It's time to update your night stands! Yoobure bedside table with LED light is your faithful partner in falling asleep. Featured with 20 RGB colors, 22 dynamic modes, the LED light can adjust color, brightness by remote or APP as you go. Imagine that you were bathing in the flowing lights, softly and peacefully, until into a sweet dream.

⚡【Charging Is A Breeze!】With 2 USB ports and 2 AC outlets, the side table can easily charge your phone or iPad. The built-in outlet is upgraded with a more user-friendly layout to avoid cable mess. Moreover, the end tables with charging stations are certified by FCC and ETL for faster and more reliable charging.

🚩【Spacious Storage Space】Featured with 5 storage parts, the small table can keep your areas clutter-free. 3 fabric storage drawers provide generous space to organize odds and ends such as remote, keys or glasses. The open shelf and tabletop are ideal for books, clocks or decorative items.

💪【Sturdy & Steady】Yoobure night stand is made of sturdy frame, robust wood board and non-woven fabric. The durable and lightweight fabric drawer of side tables bedroom can bear 6.6 lbs and the table top of the nightstand with charging station can hold up to 35 lbs. Plus, the adjustable feet and X-bar can enhance stability for this bed side table/night stand even on uneven floor or carpet.

✨【Space Saving & Stylish】Overall Size：15.4"L x 11.8"W x 25.6"H. The end tables living room are compact to perfectly fit into tight space. And their light selfweight helps to easy moving. With streamlined line and fine silhouette, the small nightstand can seamlessly blend with bedroom, living room or college dorm.

🔨【Easy Assemble & Nice Service】With assembly tools, labeled parts and detailed directions, this small end table can be finished quickly. Please feel free to reach out to us for any problems, our service team will answer the e-mail within 12 hours. The side table with charging station has 12-Month Quality Assurance!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Night Stand
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this night stand for our daughters room. She needed a place to charge her phone and provide an extra night light. She loves the ability to change the colors in the LEDs and the control the brightness. The extra plugs on top of the stand and USB ports made it very easy and convenient to charge her phone and laptop. Construction was easy and the night stand is very sturdy. It a good size for her room and the drawers are great for extra storage. The only thing that wasn't completely clear was the construction of the drawers. The drawers are NOT made of wood. They are like those collapsible fabric storage cubes. Wasn't expecting that, but the construction is solid enough to provide an adequate structure. They work just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and affordable
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our daughters room and it's perfect for the space. Tall enough to pair well with her bed and the beat features is definitely the ability to be able to directly plug in your electronics to the top of the table and not have to be moving furniture to search for a wall outlet. Also the LED color changing lights are great for ambiance or as a night light if your kids are younger. The nightstand was really easy to assemble I had my daughter help. The drawers are fabric so I am not sure it would hold anything too heavy but we have toys and books in there and it has done just fine. You can't beat the price for what you get with the light and USB ports. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great affordable night stand
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect end table for my small bedroom. I chose the black color because my other furniture is black. It was super easy to put together, and I love the charging features, and outlet for my lamp. Also, the LED lights are awesome and brings some ambiance to my room! The drawers are great for storing my things I need quick access to. Love it!!! ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little nightstand
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy and easily put together. Looks very nice. The led light strip is to long and has to be mounted at an angle underneath. The led also uses one of the usb plugs on top. Would have been better if it was below, hidden out of sight. Bought a separate cord to do this. Hoping the top surface of the nightstand is hard enough. Seems like it could be damaged easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and lot’s of storage for the it’s size.
reviews.reviewText: I like that it is compact, so it fits in tight spaces but also has a lot of storage. The drawers are pretty deep and are not flimsy. The shelf is also handy to store things such as books and tablets. The built in charging outlet and nightlight strip are a great feature.. Comes with a remote for convenience. Very happy overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and Cute
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a nightstand because I had nowhere to place my glasses at night and it works perfectly. The whole thing is on the smaller side but it’s very cute and super convenient that it has plug ins on the top. It was very easy to assemble too, I did it in maybe 30 minutes max. My lights ended up not working for some reason but since those weren’t my main interest I didn’t really care too much about it. Overall a very cute and small nightstand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great. Fits perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Works perfectly in the room. Different colored lights are fun! Surpising sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: Really like how fast and easy this was to put together. Sturdy and had plenty of room. Love the built in charging station and the light. Super lightweight and easy to move.
One of the drawers were brown , shows it being all black , and the led lights you just put on yourself not what I expected
